org.frans.thesis.GUI
Class CFScene

java.lang.Object
  org.mt4j.sceneManagement.AbstractScene
      org.frans.thesis.GUI.CFScene
All Implemented Interfaces:
org.mt4j.sceneManagement.Iscene
Direct Known Subclasses:
CFMusicScene, CFPhotoScene
public abstract class CFScene
extends org.mt4j.sceneManagement.AbstractScene

An abstract class that represents a scene on the tabletop. A scene usually contains several interactive components.

Constructor Summary

          The public constructor for CFScene.

Constructor Detail

CFScene

public CFScene(org.mt4j.MTApplication mtApplication,
               java.lang.String name)
The public constructor for CFScene. Adds two trashcans to the scene by default.

Parameters:
mtApplication - The mtapplication to which this scene belongs.
name - The name of this scene.
Method Detail

addCFComponent

public void addCFComponent(CFComponent component)
Adds an instance of CFComponent to the center of the scene.

Parameters:
component - The component to be added to the scene. It wont be added if component == null or is already in the scene.

addComponentModifier

public void addComponentModifier(CFComponentModifier modifier)
Adds a component modifier to this scene.

cfComponentMoved

public void cfComponentMoved(CFComponentModifiable component)
A method that is called when a user moved an interactive component. It notifies all components in this scene about the moved component.

Parameters:
component - The component that was moved.

public void init()

removeCFComponent

public void removeCFComponent(CFComponent component)
Removes an interactive component from this scene.

Parameters:
component - The component that has to be removed.
